iati-activity.title: Philippines Typhoon Bopha (Pablo) emergency response
iati-activity.description: To ensure that the specific needs of women, girls and boys are mainstreamed into all areas of the emergency response, providing a safer and more secure environment for the most vulnerable, allowing them to rebuild their lives more rapidly .

iati-activity.title: Additional contributions to UN consolidated and flash appeals
iati-activity.description: Provide emergency humanitarian assistance to the 250,000+ people displaced as part of the Zamboanga emergency and Bohol earthquake as well as the estimated 945,000 people who remain internally displaced by natural disaster and conflict in parts of Mindanao
